home_page_title: Guides for Schools in the UAE | Bayut
home_page_description: Detailed guides describing key elements of schools in the UAE, including an overview of curriculum, subjects, government ratings, fee structure and more for educational institutes in the country.

post_page_description: Dubai College, located at Al Sufouh, is one of the oldest british school in Dubai. To find out more about the school, read the complete guide by Bayut.
